name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Results-oriented Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in full stack development, specializing in **React**, **Python**, **FastAPI**, **TypeScript**, and **SQL**. Proficient in building high-performance applications using **Redux**, **Jest**, and **React Testing Library**, while ensuring robust testing with **PyTest**. Experienced in CI/CD practices to streamline deployment processes, leveraging tools such as **Git** and **GitHub Enterprise** within agile methodologies like Scrum and managing documentation in **Jira** and **Confluence**.

Demonstrated ability to lead the development of cloud-native solutions deployed on **Azure** and **AWS**, integrating AI/ML functionalities for intelligent decision-making and real-time analytics. Strong background in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, maintaining compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS. 

Passionate about developing impactful systems and enhancing remote teamwork through clear communication and collaboration. Hands-on experience in MLOps with tools including **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, managing production workflows and creating ML pipelines.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed and implemented scalable full-stack applications utilizing **React** and **Python (FastAPI)**, with a focus on efficient data handling using **SQL** for both healthcare and finance sectors.
• Leveraged **TypeScript** to enhance code quality and maintainability across multiple projects, improving team collaboration and reducing bugs by **30%**.
• Developed state management solutions with **Redux**, incorporating effective communication with stakeholders to ensure alignment with requirements and timely project updates.
• Integrated automated testing frameworks such as **Jest** and **PyTest** to guarantee code robustness, achieving a test coverage of over **85%** for critical components.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines utilizing **GitHub Enterprise** to automate deployments and streamline workflow, resulting in a **40%** decrease in release times.
• Actively participated in Scrum ceremonies, utilizing **Jira** and **Confluence** for transparent project tracking and documentation, enhancing remote teamwork efficiency by implementing agile methodologies.
• Adapted AI-assisted development tools to enhance productivity and code quality, ensuring high standards of deliverables in response to team objectives.
• Facilitated effective communication across distributed teams, leading to an improved response rate in project feedback cycles and faster decision-making.
• Mentored junior developers on best practices in using **React** and **Python**, contributing to approximately **5%** increase in team performance metrics through knowledge sharing.

Utilized **React (18)** and **TypeScript** to develop user-friendly front-end applications with enhanced performance, improving user experience in financial dashboards and admin portals by **30%**.
Employed **Python (FastAPI, Django)** for backend development, enhancing the scalability and maintainability of financial platforms with a microservices-based architecture, resulting in a **25%** increase in system throughput.
Implemented robust testing frameworks including **Jest** and **React Testing Library**, achieving a code coverage of over **85%** for front-end components, ensuring high-quality delivery in a **CI/CD** environment.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams through **Scrum** methodologies, effectively managing project workflows using tools like **Jira** and **Confluence**, leading to a **15%** improvement in project delivery timelines.
Conducted real-time analytics and transaction monitoring dashboards utilizing **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, empowering operation teams to detect anomalies and provide actionable insights significantly faster.
Integrated asynchronous communication strategies using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, establishing a responsive event-driven architecture that improved alert and transaction processing speed by **40%**.
Developed and optimized ETL pipelines using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Data Factory** for real-time data ingestion, facilitating continuous access to critical financial data.
Implemented machine learning models for fraud detection with **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, proactively identifying suspicious activity, thereby reducing fraud incidents by **20%**.

Utilized **React (18)**, **TypeScript**, and **Redux** in developing responsive frontend applications, contributing to a 30% increase in user engagement through enhanced interactivity and modern UI patterns.
Engineered backend services using **Python (FastAPI)**, ensuring high availability and scalability across critical modules by processing over **1M** transactions per day with low latency.
Implemented CI/CD practices with **GitHub Enterprise** and **Jira**, leading to a **50%** reduction in deployment times and improved collaboration among remote teams.
Conducted rigorous testing using **Jest**, **React Testing Library**, and **PyTest**, achieving a **95%** test success rate that ensured high code quality and reliability.
Collaborated in a **Scrum** environment, utilizing **Confluence** for documentation and enhancing team productivity by streamlining communication and task management.
Employed AI-assisted development tools to optimize coding efficiency, which resulted in a **20%** faster feature implementation cycle.
Contributed to database management using **SQL** with **PostgreSQL** and **Redis**, optimizing query performance and data retrieval times by **40%** in high-traffic scenarios.
Fostered strong communication skills and remote teamwork techniques, leading to successful project deliveries and alignment across cross-functional teams.
